alert.note: Alert for Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 6:19PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Putnam and south central Clay Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 618 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers and thunderstorms near Florahome, or 8 miles northeast of Interlachen. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... George`s Lake, Florahome and Carraway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
